name: Finatem
overview: Finatem is one of Germanyâ€™s leading independent Midmarket Private Equity investment companies. Its investment team has been active in the German midmarket for many years with extensive complementary know-how in private equity investment and German and international M&A, IPOs and structured finance. The investment team is supported by Industrial Advisers who bring local and international industrial experience. As one of the most experienced private equity companies in Germany, we believe we are a strong and reliable financial partner for successful mid-sized companies in leading market positions with clear potential for growth.
